This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{JE}} [[Java Edition Beta 1.3|Beta 1.3]].x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with Beta 1.2.x releases

== Blocks ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Blocks}}
|-
|[[Cobblestone Slab]]
|[[File:Cobblestone Slab JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|A2 = Cobblestone
|B2 = Cobblestone
|C2 = Cobblestone
|Output = Cobblestone Slab,3
}}
|Pickaxe
|Allows players to walk upward without jumping.
|-
|[[Petrified Oak Slab|Wooden Slab]]
|[[File:Oak Slab JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|A2 = Oak Planks
|B2 = Oak Planks
|C2 = Oak Planks
|Output = Petrified Oak Slab,3
}}
|Pickaxe
|
* Allows players to walk upward without jumping.
* Despite its appearance, it is fireproof and requires a pickaxe to mine.
|-
|[[Seamless Stone Slab]]
|[[File:Seamless Stone Slab JE1.png|84px]]
|Unobtainable.
|Pickaxe
|Unused block. Crashes the game if the cursor is hovered over it. The double slab version of this was a precursor to [[Smooth Stone]].
|-
|[[Sandstone Slab]]
|[[File:Sandstone Slab JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|A2 = Sandstone
|B2 = Sandstone
|C2 = Sandstone
|Output = Sandstone Slab,3
}}
|Pickaxe
|Allows players to walk upward without jumping.
|-
|[[Bed]]
|[[File:Red Bed (N) JE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|A2 = Any Wool
|A3 = Oak Planks
|B2 = Any Wool
|B3 = Oak Planks
|C2 = Any Wool
|C3 = Oak Planks
|Output = Red Bed
}}
|Axe
|Allows players to skip the night.
|-
|[[Redstone Repeater]]
|[[File:Redstone Repeater (S) JE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|A2 = Redstone Torch
|A3 = Stone
|B2 = Redstone
|B3 = Stone
|C2 = Redstone Torch
|C3 = Stone
|Output = Redstone Repeater
}}
|Pickaxe
|
* Allows redstone signals to be delayed.
* Allows redstone signals to be carried over longer distances.
|-
|[[Crying Obsidian]]
|[[File:Crying Obsidian Programmer Art.png|84px]]
|Exists only as a texture.
|N/A
|Originally intended to be used to set the player's spawn.
